title: Transversal Angle Explorer
description: Interactive exploration of the four angle relationships formed when a transversal crosses two parallel lines. Students drag a handle to rotate the transversal and click buttons to highlight corresponding, alternate interior, alternate exterior, and same-side interior angle pairs.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Geometry
Mathematics
Angles
Parallel Lines
Transversals
learningObjectives: Identify corresponding, alternate interior, alternate exterior, and same-side interior angles
Verify that corresponding, alternate interior, and alternate exterior angles are congruent
Verify that same-side interior angles are supplementary
Evaluate how angle relationships hold as the transversal angle changes

educational.standardDescription: Prove theorems about lines and angles, including when parallel lines are cut by a transversal
